articles.author: Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: Ukraine successfully shoots down first Russian strategic bomber - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: The Russian defense ministry said the bomber crashed as it was returning from a mission in Ukraine “due to technical malfunction.”
articles.content:
Ukraine's military intelligence said Ukrainians used the same means to down the bomber as were previously used to shoot down an A-50 surveillance plane over the Sea of Azov in January.
